trans-unit.target: ノングラムパズルソルバー。

trans-unit.source: This project provides a general nonogram solver. It can determine if a puzzle is not solveable by a human, and if it is solveable, can provide the solution.
trans-unit.target: このプロジェクトは一般的なノノングラムソルバーを提供します.人間が解けないパズルかどうかを判断し、解ける場合は解答を提供することができます。

trans-unit.source: This solver can be used to create nonogram puzzles given a successful final solution. If the given solution is not solvable, the solver will suggest “hint” squares to be filled in when the nonogram is given to a human solver.
trans-unit.target: This solver can be used to create nonogram puzzles given a successful final solution. If the given solution is not solvable, the solver will suggest “hint” squares to be filled in when the nonogram is given to a human solver.
